metadata.name: Custom Bossbar [Workshop Build]
metadata.description:
You need ModConfigMenu to modify which final bosses this will appear on (they are all enabled w/o though) and color / chroma.
If you want to add an entity to the list, then you need to put this in the console: lua CustomBossbar.ENTITYLIST["Type.Variant.SubType"] = true
To get the values, type "spawn [whatever]" and put in the values of the one you want and make sure to put in the extra ".0" (e.g. "13.0.0")
